transcript.text: so when you're coming alongside a penis
for you give you sunshine so there's
been this for current concept that's
come into my life multiple times over
the past couple weeks so being how
synchronistic it all is I wanted to make
this video to address that very concept
and the first time this showed up was
when I was at the Eclipse of disclosure
conference sitting on the speaker's
panel at the end of the conference I had
been T neo Massaro on my right here
Jarrell Donnell on my left you know
there was Corey Goode Laura Eisenhower
on it so all of us were on stage there
was a lot of us 10 12 maybe but during
the Q&A session there was a woman in the
audience and bless her heart she was
asking the whole panel this very
personal question and her question was
what advice could we give her what
advice could we offer her because her
family was beginning to figure out where
her beliefs really were her family was
beginning to view her as the black sheep
right and unfortunately I didn't get a
chance to offer any advice her answered
that question at all while I was on that
panel that day but hey that's why I have
this camera and this YouTube channel to
do that now not only did it happen that
day but like I said it happened again
and that was when I was working with one
of my online coaching clients you know
if you're interested go check it out on
my website but I was working with one my
clients and he said something to the
same effect that that woman did his was
a few years ago he was telling me it was
around the twenty twelve timeframe and
his co-workers begin to figure out where
his beliefs were and they began to poke
fun at him same kind of concept is that
woman right we have friends families
co-workers whatever the case may be when
they find out where your beliefs lie
because you you know you're breaking
away
from the brain wash and you're breaking
away from the mind control and they have
yet to do that they'll start calling you
crazy and trust me
that shit's tough I went through the
very same thing four or five years ago
heck I still go through that stuff now I
get people calling me crazy all the time
not quite my friends and family anymore
because they know what I do they know
who I am but you know strangers say that
and it's not fun it's not fun it
fun at all so what I wanted to do is
simply offer you advice on what to do
when people who are close to you who
you've grown up with start to ostracize
you shun you because they're finding out
that you question the status quo they're
beginning to find out that you're
different and that's the first point is
understand that in this world it's not
you who are insane it's the world that's
crazy
you know I'm paraphrasing a quote here
but wasn't it Krishnamurti who said it's
no measure of health to be well adjusted
to a profoundly sick Society right so
people who are calling you crazy for
just simply questioning connecting the
dots seeing that something ain't right
don't worry about that second piece of
advice right understand that everybody
is on their own path this is the biggest
piece of advice that I can offer you
because understanding that everybody is
on their own path you don't hold
attachments to what they believe right
understand that you can't lead a horse I
mean you can lead a horse to water but
you can't make them drink it right so
being that they're on your own path
you're on yours it's a choice that every
single person makes on these paths to
begin to wake up to begin to see reality
some people have made that choice early
in life some people might have made it
decades ago some people might have made
it recently right
many people are making that choice
recently because of how crazy the world
is getting that they're beginning to
scratch their head and
questions but many people still have yet
to make that choice many people are
still ingrained in the brainwashing
they're still ingrained in the mind
control and like it or not that's the
way it is and that's okay right like I
said it's all a choice you've made that
choice so you're continuing on that path
of evolution right other people that
have yet to make that choice eventually
they will a lot of people say never
never say never paradoxically right I
don't I don't like to deal in absolutes
I'm very wary of people who say always
and never constantly because it's life
is very black-and-white for them that
they're not able to mold their beliefs
right if you deal in absolutes
someone might seem like they're
extremely ingrained in the system and
like they will never wake up
but trust me people will come around so
what I want to tell you is to keep
speaking your truth
keep looking crazy if it's a burning
desire within you to share your truths
to share what you're finding about about
the world on Facebook or on social media
or you know whatever the case may be on
videos do it right follow that intuition
follow that guidance speak the truth we
need more people with courage to begin
speaking what's really on their minds
and to question what's going on don't
have any fear in doing that trust me I
did for a long time and it causes a lot
of spiritual tension in you when you
hold back I got to a point where I
couldn't hold back anymore and look
what's happened since then right I
couldn't even imagine that all this
stuff that's happened in the past few
months would have happened but again
when you start following your bliss when
you start following that gut instinct in
you it'll lead you down paths that you
wouldn't even imagined and those people
that you thought wouldn't come around
will eventually come around and the last
point that I want to make here is that
when hits the
fan right when things really start
getting crazy as if things aren't crazy
enough in this world but when they
really start getting crazy right
everybody's going to be searching for
answers everybody that didn't make that
choice yet will have to make that choice
sooner or later right when hits the
fan so they know that you are already
searching they're gonna just begin on
that path of awakening and you're they
already know that you're far down that
road so all the people calling you crazy
now when hits the fan they're going
to be coming to you for answers so speak
your truths
speak them loud and trust me people will
come around they will stop ridiculing
you and they will begin coming to you
for that guidance
[Music]
